Attach Color Codes to Data Frame Based on Status

Source: R/utils_plot.R
attach_color_code.Rd

This function maps the status_column values in the provided data frame to color codes, based on a specified color mapping, and attaches these color codes as a new column color_code in the data frame.

Usage

attach_color_code(df_long, marker_color, status_column)

Arguments

df_long

A data frame containing a column specified by status_column which indicates the status of each sample.

marker_color

A named list or other key-value mapping structure where the names or keys correspond to statuses and the values correspond to color codes.

status_column

The name of the column in df_long that contains the status information.

Value

A data frame identical to df_long, but with an additional column color_code which contains the color codes mapped from the status_column based on the marker_color mapping.
